name: Dribble Hoops
description:
Dunking, ankle breakers, crossovers, and all the cool stuff you enjoy at your fingertip!

Dribble hoops is the first person basketball experience you were waiting for.

HOW TO PLAY:
+ Drag your finger to move.
+ Tap to jump, Tap to shoot.
+ Tap inside the dunking zone to dunk.
+ Tap in the right spot to Power Dunk!
+ Score high and level up your skills.

Dribble hoops starts easy so anyone can play,
and master all the skills.
The AI evolves overtime so be ready for a
challenge.

Check out all the bonus levels for even more fun!
